nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: {name}… ten little steps toward “good.” How sweet. How predictable.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: You forgot where you are. Dreadheim doesn’t reward saints. It devours them.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: So I’m doing you a favor. Out. Before you embarrass yourself with mercy.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Helheim’s wasteland. Quiet. Cold. Honest. It suits your new little halo.
